name: Mountain Tumble
description:
Hey! Thanks for checking out my game!

This was made for the May Day 2021 GameJam.

The theme was Emergancy.

Me and my partner created a platformer in which the subject is on a falling mountain in need of escaping.

I hope you enjoy the game :)

Controls:

Left - Left Arrow

Right - Right Arrow

Jump - Spacebar

Dive - Down Arrow

Jobs:

Me - Coding, Art

Emmett - Art, SFX

Note: This is the first game either of us have fully made and released :D
